name: Kingsley’s WhatPulse Widget
author: Kingsley Muir

sections.description: A simple widget for displaying WhatPulse statistics.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.3

Release Date – 23rd August, 2023

  • Updated Tested version
  • Updated cURL to use WP Remote API instead
  • Added some div wrappers and before_ and after_ options for themes

1.2

Release Date – 13th December, 2021

  • Updated Tested version
  • Fixed ‘th’ suffixes

1.1

Release Date – 11th December, 2017

  • Updated file_get_contents to use cURL
  • Updated tested version

1

Release Date – 28th June, 2016

  • Fixed some readme typos and installed plugin on WordPresses going back to WordPress 3.0

0.1

Release Date – 22nd June, 2016

  • First version
